Enchant creature
{U}{U}: Enchanted creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)

text: Flying

name: Vastwood Animist
text: {T}: Target land you control becomes an X/X Elemental creature until end of turn, where X is the number of Allies you control. It's still a land.

editions.flavor: He calls on the forests for counsel and summons the earth to his cause.

—Mulak Ffar, Vastwood Biodiversity

"A long and difficult incision revealed that all vital organs are housed in the head, save for a long chain of stomachs, forty in all, leading from its throat to the end of the tail."—Mulak Ffar, Vastwood Biodiversity
The gorger's insect-like eyes pick up the slightest movement in any direction. Its body then whips toward its prey with startling speed, swallowing it in one engulfing gulp.

"I've known true ferocity and power. Those brazen ‘planar-walkers' have no idea what wild really means."
—Chadir the Navigator

name: Vedalken Blademaster
text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

editions.flavor: Vedalken have six thin, agile fingers on each hand, giving them unparalleled dexterity.

name: Vedalken Certarch

editions.flavor: "An appropriately detailed model is indistinguishable from reality, and much easier to control."

name: Vedalken Entrancer

editions.flavor: "Don't get any ideas."
Their denial reaches far into your future.

name: Vedalken Ghoul
text: Whenever Vedalken Ghoul becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.

editions.flavor: For four nights following Ennor's death and the reclaiming of his etherium, its recipients were found slain, the etherium ripped from their bodies.

name: Vedalken Heretic
text: Whenever Vedalken Heretic deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

editions.flavor: "Etherium clouded my eyes, clogged my ears, desensitized my skin. Now that I can feel, I can begin to learn."

name: Vedalken Infuser
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.

editions.flavor: "All plans begin as dreams. I intend to awaken them."

name: Vedalken Mastermind
text: {U}, {T}: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

name: Vedalken Orrery
text: You may cast spells as though they had flash.

editions.flavor: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.
The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.

name: Vedalken Outlander
text: Protection from red

text:
{X}{1}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Ventifact Bottle. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, if Ventifact Bottle has a charge counter on it, tap it and remove all charge counters from it. Add {C} to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Vent Sentinel
text:
Defender
{1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player equal to the number of creatures with defender you control.

name: Verdant Catacombs

name: Verdant Confluence
text:
Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature.
• Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
